{{title|1=operator=={{small|(ranges::chunk_view::''outer-iterator'')}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/chunk_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool
    operator==( const /*outer-iterator*/&amp; x, std::default_sentinel_t );
}}

Compares the {{rlp|/|iterator}} and the [[cpp/iterator/default_sentinel_t|sentinel]].

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}. Equivalent to:

{{source|1=
return *x.parent_-&gt;current_ == ranges::end(x.parent_-&gt;base_) and x.parent_-&gt;remainder_ != 0;
}}

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::chunk_view::''outer-iterator''}}|plural=no}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|{{rlp|/|iterator}} to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The result of comparison.
